attributes.action: Independently Regulate MLM Business in the U.K. or Ban them.
attributes.additional_details:
Over 500,000 people work in MLM business in the U.K. to earn extra money whilst the industry in its present form doesn’t work their must be a better way to protect people whilst allowing them to earn! 

Multi Level Marketing (pyramid selling)
Sellers have no representation! Or recourse!

Research published by the Federal Trade Commission, Dr Jon M Taylor, MBA, Ph.D from the Consumer Awareness Institute calculates that an average 99.6% of people lose money after deducting business expenses.
attributes.background:
Independently regulate MLM business in the U.K. 

The DSA is the industries self serving PR organisation and doesn't represent the best interests of its sellers/consultants/distributors it protects the interests of the industry!

Regulate independently or Ban the business model! Protect people!

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Enforce more regulation and transparency for MLM companies in the UK: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/581482

Ban Multi Level Marketing businesses from trading in the UK: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/583958
